document.discussion_title: Finally, a Marketer Who Understands Engineers
document.topic_text: Finally, a Marketer Who Understands Engineers Mon, 04/25/2016 - 07:00 Smart Marketing for Engineers shows that it's possible for a non-engineer to understand how engineers think.
